snippet: President Obama is trying to charm a party that clings to calcified ideas on spending and taxes. Just look at the latest from Representative Paul Ryan.
abstract: Editorial warns Pres Obama that Rep Paul Ryan's 2014 spending plan should dispel any illusions he might have that Republicans in Congress are willing to accept change; contends Ryan's budget shows that attempting to bring reason to unreasonable party will result in failure.
lead_paragraph: President Obama is trying to charm a party that clings to calcified ideas on spending and taxes. Just look at the latest from Representative Paul Ryan.

headline.seo: The Worst of Paul Ryan’s Budgets
headline.main: The Worst of the Ryan Budgets
headline.print_headline: The Worst of the Ryan Budgets
